roleset.name: pick out beforehand

example.name: pre_select-v
example.text: Problems with it though are that questions are pre selected and answers pre written , allowing spin doctors to work on it .

example.name: preselect-v: args 1, 3
example.text: THE battle for Greenway will be a repeat showdown of the 2010 federal election after Jayme Diaz was preselected as the Liberal Party 's candidate for the vital western Sydney seat on Saturday .

propbank.arg: as the Liberal Party 's candidate for the vital western Sydney seat on Saturday

example.name: preselect-v: args 0, 1, 2
example.text: Sounds like he would do more good for your party if you preselected him from your ranks at the next election and made him treasurer .

roleset.note: PRESELECT-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, relation to select.01. No VNcls. (from preselect.01-v)
